Dónde Shopper Marketing Solutions

  • Create powerful localized lead generation with geo­targeted landing pages and creatives
  • Drive foot traffic with better attribution & analytics
  • Close the loop between mobile advertising and local retail sales

Improve Your Local Brand Experience

  • Offer mobile shoppers a seamless brand experience with store locations integrated inside native apps
  • Send your customers highly personalized & localized marketing emails to impact real-time buying decisions
  • Increase your mobile engagement with customers by 4x

Get Attribution for Mobile Ad Campaigns to Offline Retail

  • Run geotargeted ad campaigns with offers for your customers’ closest store to increase purchases by 4x
  • Track the effectiveness of your local ad campaigns to close the loop between online and offline traffic, connecting in-store purchase data with online campaigns
  • Understand store ROI from online campaigns to optimize for high value purchases

In the first two quarters of implementation, Dónde improved YoY mobile conversion rates by 147% and 389%.

Dónde has provided us with a turnkey solution for both our retail locations and scheduling demonstrations at ballparks across the U.S. We’ve been very impressed with the technology as our sales reps can access the custom locator to register attendees, making it easier to monitor our highest performers and of course, the impact it all has on the bottom line.

The marketing insights and analytics reports Dónde provides is amazing information to have!!!

Mark Stevens
Director of Digital Marketing, LasikPlus
